title: what will happen if didn't play ranked for the end of the season
body:
what will happen if didn't play ranked for the end of the season ?
will i get demoted  after a while ?

replies.body: Bronze, Silver, and Gold players currently do not decay in their current placements.  Higher tiers can decay after a certain amount of days without playing.  More information on that is available in our [Ranked Play FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ).  Hopefully, that helps clear things up!
